DOC.brief_summary: The objective study follow : 1 ) determine effect daily consumption whole grain barley six week risk factor cardiovascular disease compare diet low whole grain , 2 ) compare effect daily consumption whole grain barley whole grain oat six week determine response two grain different .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Daily Intake Whole Grain Barley Oats Biomarkers Cardiovascular Disease
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 2570 year Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 19 ≤ 38 Willingness ability make schedule appointment clinical site require study protocol Do regularly consume breakfast dislike cereal breakfast Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction grain ( e.g. , wheat , gluten , barley ) Presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , untreated unstable hypothyroidism , untreated unstable hyperthyroidism , certain cancer , gastrointestinal disease , pancreatic disease , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin Fasting triglyceride > 300 mg/dL Fasting glucose > 126 mg/dL Use cholesterol lower medication Blood pressure > 180/100 hypertension treat calcium channel blocker , direct act vasodilator , beta blocker History bariatric certain surgery relate weight control History major surgery within 3 month enrollment Smokers tobacco user ( 6 month prior start study ) Antibiotic use intervention 3 month prior intervention period History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) Volunteers lose 10 % body weight within last 6 month Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
